title: Asset Health Index Calculation
description: An asset manager wants to calculate a composite 'health index' for each wind turbine in a farm to prioritize maintenance.

tasks.description: Gather key performance and condition data for each turbine, including vibration analysis, temperature readings, and fault history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a comprehensive dataset for all turbines.

tasks.description: Apply a weighted scoring model to the data to calculate a single health index score (0-100) for each turbine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a health score for every asset.

tasks.description: Generate a ranked list of turbines from lowest to highest health score and recommend inspections for the bottom 10%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a prioritized list for the maintenance team.
